question_text: Which of the following describe likely characteristics of a non-removable laptop battery? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Requires opening the chassis to access
May be glued or screwed into place
Can be quickly ejected by the user
correct_answer: Requires opening the chassis to access
May be glued or screwed into place
explanation: Only modular batteries allow fast user access; internal ones require disassembly.
